sentences.sContent: This time the most conspicuous victim has been the Icelandic krona.
sentences.sContent_eng: This time the most conspicuous victim has been the Icelandic krona.
sentences.sCn: 此次危机中最明显的受害者就是冰岛克朗。

sentences.sContent: The British pound, Swedish krona, Swiss franc and Canadian dollar are also trading well above their burger benchmark.
sentences.sContent_eng: The British pound, Swedish krona, Swiss franc and Canadian dollar are also trading well above their burger benchmark.
sentences.sCn: 英镑，瑞典克朗，瑞士法郎和加拿大元的汇率同样也是高于其汉堡包基准。

synos.tran: 克朗（瑞典及冰岛的货币单位）

trans.tranCn: 克朗（瑞典及冰岛的货币单位）
trans.tranOther: the standard unit of money in Sweden and Iceland
